books.author: by Sara Gruen
books.description: After his parents die in a car accident, a young veterinary student — and an elephant — save a Depression-era circus.
books.name: WATER FOR ELEPHANTS

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: The Minneapolis detective Lucas Davenport investigates the murders of two girls who were kidnapped in 1985 and whose bodies have just been found.
books.name: BURIED PREY

books.author: by Charlaine Harris
books.description: The telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse seeks the culprit in a firebombing.
books.name: DEAD RECKONING

books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: Detective Lindsay Boxer and the Women’s Murder Club race to find a missing baby.
books.name: 10TH ANNIVERSARY

books.author: by Emily Giffin
books.description: A maid of honor to her charmed friend, Rachel White has always played by the rules. But that changes on her 30th birthday.
books.name: SOMETHING BORROWED

books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The lawyer for an alleged serial killer is murdered, and two former Secret Service agents are on the case.
books.name: THE SIXTH MAN

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: Routinely doing business from his Lincoln Town Cars, the bottom-feeding attorney Mickey Haller is asked to defend the scion of a wealthy family who might not be guilty of a murderous crime.
books.name: THE LINCOLN LAWYER

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the frozen wastes to the north of Winterfell, sinister and supernatural forces are mustering.
books.name: A GAME OF THRONES

books.author: by Emily Giffin
books.description: After being betrayed by her fiancé and her best friend, Darcy Rhone flees to London.
books.name: SOMETHING BLUE

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: The defense lawyer Mickey Haller represents a woman facing home foreclosure who is accused of killing a banker.
books.name: THE FIFTH WITNESS

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: The third volume of the Millennium trilogy, about a Swedish hacker and a journalist.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO KICKED THE HORNET’S NEST

books.author: by Paula McLain
books.description: Ernest Hemingway’s first wife, Hadley, narrates this novel set in Paris.
books.name: THE PARIS WIFE

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: A middle-aged woman takes a cross-country road trip with her daughter and former mother-in-law.
books.name: A TURN IN THE ROAD

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: From the citadel of Dragonstone to the shores of Winterfell, factions vie for control of a divided land: Book 2 of “A Song of Ice and Fire.”
books.name: A CLASH OF KINGS
